duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identify and recommend financial products and services to help members reach their financial goals.
Service members on the teller line with monetary transactions, account maintenance, ownership changes, wire requests, IRA transactions, automatic transfers, and disputes.
Serve as a notary public for members.
Maintain and deepen member relationships through consultative analysis and recommendation of Desert Financial products.
Strategically build and optimize referral network and pipeline through outbound calls, community outreach, and networking.
Meet or exceed monthly performance metrics through outbound calls, community outreach, and networking.
Obtain Nationwide Mortgage Lending System (NMLS) and Notary Public Certifications through training.
